mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video (member_id, travel_id, coordinates, video_s3_key, video_content_type, title, description) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{travelId}, ST_GeomFromText(#{coordinates}, 4326), #{videoS3Key}, #{videoContentType}, #{title}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT video_id, member_id, travel_id, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, video_s3_key, thumbnail_s3_key, video_content_type, thumbnail_content_type, title, description FROM video WHERE video_id = #{video_id}

SELECT video_id, member_id, travel_id, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, video_s3_key, thumbnail_s3_key, video_content_type, thumbnail_content_type, title, description FROM video WHERE travel_id = #{travel_id}

SELECT video_id, member_id, travel_id, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, video_s3_key, thumbnail_s3_key, video_content_type, thumbnail_content_type, title, description FROM video WHERE member_id = #{member_id}

SELECT video_id, member_id, travel_id, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, video_s3_key, thumbnail_s3_key, video_content_type, thumbnail_content_type, title, description, ST_Distance(coordinates, ST_GeomFromText(#{coordinates}, 4326)) AS distance FROM video WHERE ST_Distance(coordinates, ST_GeomFromText(#{coordinates}, 4326)) <= #{distance} ORDER BY distance;
